hero.description: Castium is a personal and modern platform that centralizes your movies, series, music, podcasts and personal content in a single elegant interface, accessible from anywhere.

features.title: Simple. Fast. Powerful.
features.description: Everything you need to manage your personal media library.

organized.title: Organized movies and series
organized.description: Import your collection and automatically retrieve posters, descriptions, genres, actors and more.

music.title: Music & Podcasts
music.description: Access your tracks, albums and playlists in one click. Discover your podcasts and resume where you left off.

sync.title: Synced everywhere
sync.description: PC, mobile, tablet or TV — Castium stays smooth and intuitive, accessible wherever you are.

privacy.title: Your content, your rules
privacy.description: Castium does not sell your data, track your activity or impose ads on you.

interface.title: Polished interface
interface.description: An experience inspired by Kodi and others, but designed for the cloud with a clean and modern interface.

auto.title: Automatic import
auto.description: Metadata is automatically retrieved for all your content. No more manual work.

beta.title: Castium is coming soon
beta.description: We’re putting the finishing touches on an elegant, modern platform built to last. Join us and be among the first to try Castium.
beta.helper: Get early access to the beta
